verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Arise, shine, for your light has come
And the Glory of the Lord rises upon you
Nations will come to your light
And Kings to the brightness of your dawning

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Then you will look and be radiant
Your heart will throb and swell with joy
The wealth of the seas will be brought to you
To you the riches of the nations will come

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
See your sons coming from far away
And your daughters being carried on the hip
Foreigners will rebuild your walls
And their Kings will serve you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Enlarge the place of your tent
Stretch your tent curtains wide
Lengthen your ropes, strengthen your stakes
Do not hold back
For you are to be a tent of meeting
Station yourselves around me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For you will spread out to thr right and to the left
And dispossess nations and settle in their desolate cities
Do not be afraid, you will not suffer shame
Do not fear disgrace, you will not be humiliated

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
With everlasting kindness
I will have compassion on you
Never will I remove from you
My covenant Peace

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I will built you with stones of turquoise
Your foundations with sapphires
Your gates sparkling jewels
All your walls precious stones

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
In righteousness you will be established
Tyranny will be far from you
Terror will be far removed
It will not come near you

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
If anyone attacks you, it will not be my doing
Whoever attacks you will surrender to you
No weapon forged against you will prevail
Every accusing tounge you will refute

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
All who despise you will bow at your feet
You will be called City of the Lord
You will drink the milk of nations
And be nursed at royal breasts

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Instead of bronze I will bring you gold
And silver in place of iron
Instead of wood I will bring you bronze
And Iron in place of stones

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
No longer will violence be heard in your land
Nor destruction within your boarders
But you will call your walls salvation
And your gates praise

verse.name: v13
verse.lines:
The Lord will be your everlasting Light
And your God will be your glory

verse.name: v14
verse.lines:
You are the shoot I have planted
The work of my hands
The least shall become a thousand
And the smallest a mighty nation

verse.name: v15
verse.lines:
You will lead my people out into the land
And into the ministry of their calling
For you are Church builders
And Hell's gates will not prevail against you

verse.name: v16
verse.lines:
You will walk in the power of my Spirit
And I the Lord will teach you

verse.name: v17
verse.lines:
Come to me in purity and humility
And the door will be opened
I will enter and we will harvest together
You will be my Heart and my Light

verse.name: v18
verse.lines:
Father, may Your Kingdom come
May we become like Your Son
Through the work of Your Spirit
May your will be done

verse.name: v19
verse.lines:
So be it, let it be so
Amen and amen
